error.message: Parameter $event of method Drupal\domain_lang\EventSubscriber\DomainLangConfigRedirect::checkRequest() has typehint with deprecated class Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Event\GetResponseEvent: since Symfony 4.3, use RequestEvent instead

Parameter $event of method Drupal\domain_lang\EventSubscriber\DomainLangConfigRedirect::setRedirectResponse() has typehint with deprecated class Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Event\GetResponseEvent: since Symfony 4.3, use RequestEvent instead
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
